astrology_card.title: The Astrology Collection
astrology_card.description: Astrology is a collection of my ideas and personal projects. I like to make lives easier when there is a chance. There is no doubt that computers have played a key role in automation. However, solution is more than just coding...
astrology_card.caption: Montauk Point, NY

events.name: Taurus
events.summary: A windows PE application to backup/restore system images.

events.name: Libra
events.summary: A universal Windows platform app for viewing/annotating PDFs.

events.name: Sagittarius
events.summary: Adobe Lightroom plugin to GeoTag photos with Google location history data.

events.name: Capricorn
events.summary: Snake, the once-popular game in grandfather's Nokia cellphone.

work_card.title: At Work...
work_card.description: I worked with different people to implement reliable applications, like databases and websites. I also worked on exploratory research projects. These projects may not become applications eventually. However, they help us explore the unknown territories
work_card.caption: Bronx, NY

events.title: Managing Bioinformatics Pipelines
events.summary: Develops a smart pipeline management system with Intelligence and Insights.

events.title: CrowdSeq: Collecting Annotations for Genes and Variants
events.summary: Develops a unified database for storing annotations from crowdsourcing.

events.title: Database for Genomic Sequencing and Analysis
events.summary: Develops a database, web interface and APIs for tracking patient samples throughout genomic sequencing and analysis process.

events.title: Pathology and Clinical Data Collection/Review System
events.summary: A website designed for collaborators from 20+ labs/hospitals around the world to upload and review pathology/clinical data, including high resolution images and reports.

events.title: Smart Grid Fault Diagnosis and Mitigation
events.summary: Investigated the modeling, simulation and control of electric power transmission systems, we built a hybrid simulation model to incorporate discrete events and the fluctuations on continuous states. Based on the simulation model, we designed fault diagnosis algorithm and proposed a data-driven decision making model to improve the reliability.

events.title: Power Distribution Reliability
events.summary: Working with New York State Electric & Gas (NYSEG), I built simulation models to evaluate the standard indices (SAIFI, SAIDI and CAIDI). In addition, I proposed a cost-effective strategy for installing equipments with an optimization program.

events.title: Small Signal Controllability and Observability of Power Systems
events.summary: Power system is a non-linear complex system. However, around the normal operating point, we can develop small signal model and investigate our ability to control and observe the system. My first journey to the American Control Conference presented the idea of improving the combination of fault-tolerance, controllability and observability.

events.title: Access Database Development
events.summary: Developed Microsoft Access database with SQL, VBA and Google Maps Javascript API.

events.title: Modeling and Simulation of Pedestrians
events.summary: This project integrates perception, cognitive control, path planning, reactive movement appearance and characteristics components in an agent model. With the agent-based simulation, We reproduced several self-emerge phenomena of pedestrian flows in public environment.

events.title: Distributed Simulation in Vehicle Manufacturing
events.summary: Explored the network communication protocols and data transfer between different commercial software.
